name: gladys-assistant
description: Gladys is an open-source, privacy-focused home assistant that integrates smart home devices using workflows, scenes, and automations. It supports MQTT, Zigbee, Z-Wave, and cloudless control designed for personal servers.
features: Privacy-Focused Control: Manage smart home devices without cloud dependencies or data sharing.
Protocol Support: Integrate devices via MQTT, Zigbee, Z-Wave, and other popular protocols.
Scenes and Automations: Create complex workflows and automations triggered by time, sensors, or events.
Device Integration: Connect lights, sensors, cameras, and appliances from multiple manufacturers.
Dashboard Interface: Monitor and control your home through a customizable web dashboard.
Local Processing: All automation logic runs locally on your server for reliability and privacy.
Moderation Tools: Advanced controls for managing device access and automation rules.
Community Plugins: Extend functionality with community-developed integrations and features.
